title: UniversalImagePrompt
description: A structured, model-agnostic prompt description for text-to-image generation.

concept.description: Very short summary of the main idea (1 short phrase).

scene.description: What is happening, where, and with what key elements.

setting.description: Environment or location (city street, forest, spaceship bridge, fantasy castle hall, abstract void, etc.).

time_of_day.description: Time and ambience: dawn, golden hour, night, neon-lit, overcast, etc.

key_elements.description: Important objects, characters, creatures, or landmarks that must appear.

action.description: Short description of what is happening in the scene. Leave empty if static.

mood_keywords.description: Mood/adjectives: dreamy, dark, epic, cozy, surreal, cyberpunk, whimsical, etc.

art_style.description: Overall style: photorealistic, cinematic, digital painting, anime, pixel art, lowpoly, oil painting, concept art, etc.

color_palette.description: Dominant colors/palette: warm oranges and reds, cold blues, neon, pastel, monochrome, etc.

influences.description: Optional references: 'Studio Ghibli-like', 'dark fantasy', 'sci-fi concept art', etc. No direct copyrighted names if avoidable.

composition.description: How the image is framed and composed.

framing.description: Wide shot, mid shot, close-up, top-down, isometric, etc.

focus.description: What should be in focus or emphasized.

depth_of_field.description: Shallow DOF with blurred background, deep focus, etc.

additional_notes.description: Extra composition hints: symmetry, rule of thirds, leading lines, minimalism, cluttered detail, etc.

render_quality.description: Overall quality: high detail, ultra-detailed, painterly, sketchy, etc.

aspect_ratio_hint.description: Desired aspect ratio or orientation, e.g. '3:4 vertical', '16:9 wide', '1:1 square'. This is a hint, not a command.

avoid.description: What should NOT appear (e.g., 'no text', 'no watermark', 'no frame', etc.).

final_prompt.description: Single coherent English description combining all important details from this JSON, ready to be used as a text prompt. No JSON/meta references.
